Class GraphicsHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • GraphicsHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Graphics

    public class GraphicsHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements Graphics
    A class for handling graphical changes

    0.2 (2017.01.24)
    Author:

        Specified by:

                     java.lang.String color)
        Draw a cell at a specific point, onto a canvas
        Specified by:
        drawCell in interface Graphics
        Parameters:
        target - the String representing the target canvas in a private HashMap. Can either be "bg" or "fg"
        point - a Point representing a position in a 2D array
        color - a String representing a hex value, e.g. "#FF000"

      • initCanvases

        private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas> initCanvases()
        Creates a HashMap of String, Canvas pairs, to map "bg" and "fg" to the background and foreground canvas, respectively.
        Returns:
        a HashMap containing bg and fg Canvases.
